attention3.ptxt: If working the service described under the Precautions of Electric Throttle Body System Calibration , perform following steps for electric throttle body system calibration.

s1.ptxt: If electric throttle body assembly and/or accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly are replaced, perform following steps.

s2.ptxt: Disconnect negative cable at battery for 20 seconds or more for the purpose of clearing calibration data of closed throttle position from memory in ECM.

s1.ptxt: Keep ignition switch at ON position for 5 seconds or more without running engine.
